Web Design / Conversion

The 12 Minute Website Conversion Audit

A fast checklist you can run today to see where leads are leaking.

Published 2/2/2026

You do not need a full rebuild to get better leads. Run this short audit first and you will know exactly where the leaks are.

Member preview

Unlock the full article

Get the full playbook plus new AI workshop and SEO insights.

No spam. Unsubscribe anytime.

Most websites fail at the same steps: unclear value proposition, weak proof, and slow paths to action. You can spot all three in minutes.

Quick audit steps

  1. Ask three people to read your homepage for 10 seconds. Can they explain what you do?
  2. Check mobile speed and the first paint time. If it feels slow, it is.
  3. Count how many clicks it takes to book a call.
  4. Replace generic testimonials with results and specific outcomes.
  5. Make the primary CTA the only high-contrast button on the page.

If you want the full conversion teardown, schedule a consult and I will map the fixes to your site.
